name: Pass or Perish
description:
Team Members

Lakshay Sharma (Graphic designer)

Saikat Kuila (Graphic Designer)

Deepanshu  (Producer)

Shivam Dudeja (Developer)

Ishaan Kaushik (developer)

Sumit Prasad(Programmer)

The primary objective of this game is to arrange cubes in such a manner that they pass through the space approaching from the front.
